column4: guys, after about 5 minutes of using ubuntu, my wireless nic stopped working and i noticed the smell of burnt rubber bands. i had used this laptop with XP flawlessly for 5 months. ubuntu ruined it. who do i contact about getting compensation for this?
so who is going to fucking pay for my nic
that is fucking bullshit. their defective caca destroyed my nic
*sue* ubuntu.. are you f***ing kidding me :|
